Tool:          SFML
Last Updated:  May 18 2018
Last Build:    May 2020 2020
Version:	   2.5.0

Notes:

Download:     https://www.sfml-dev.org/download.php

Instructions: https://www.sfml-dev.org/tutorials/2.4/compile-with-cmake.php

- Patch the files (patch.exe --binary -p1 < "file.patch")
- Use CMAKE to create targets for VS
- Build only System - Audio - Main
- Copy ext libs and DLLs
